entry.title: TurboChef Eco - High Speed Oven with Impingement & Microwave - 12.5" x 10.5" x 7.2" Cavity (WDH)
entry.summary:
Vendor: TurboChef
Type: High Speed Oven
Price: 8820.00

TurboChef's Eco is their most energy-efficient oven and their smallest footprint—only 16" wide and 22" deep. It features a single motor which vertically circulates air impingement, top-launched RF energy, and a stirrer to help ensure even air and energy distribution.

The smart menu system is capable of storing up to 256 recipes, and menu settings are customizable via USB or manual entry. The Eco oven comes standard with the following accessories: 1 bottle of oven cleaner, 1 bottle of oven guard, 2 trigger sprayers, 2 solid aluminum pans, and 1 aluminum paddle.

      • Microwave and impingement cooking
      • Cooks delicious food faster than ever
      • Output is equal to larger ovens without the space or energy cost requirements
      • Customizable menu settings via USB or manual entry
      • Manual mode for on-the-fly cooking
      • Stackable (requires stacking kit)
      • High-contrast, durable touch display
      • Consistent chef-quality results
      • Operates without a ventilation hood
      • Comes with accessories

COOK TIMES

Nachos 1 Minute
Breakfast Sandwich
 1 Minute 30 Seconds
Flatbread
 1 Minute 30 Seconds
Cheese Sticks (6)
 1 Minute 50 Seconds
Vegetables
 2 Minutes

    SPECS

    Model ECO-9500
    Exterior     Stainless Steel
    Interior Stainless Steel
    Dimensions (WDH) 23" x 21.1" x 27.5"
    Cook Chamber (WDH) 6" x 15.5" x 14.5"
    Cook Chamber Volume 0.54 cubic feet
    Top Wall Clearance 5"
    Sides Wall Clearance 1"
    Ventless Yes
    Electrical 208/240VAC, 60Hz, 20A, 3.6kW MW
    Ship Weight 191 lb

    WARRANTY

    One year parts and labour warranty.

entry.title: Vollrath JB3H - Electric Countertop Conveyor Oven - 14.5" wide belt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Countertop Conveyor Oven
Price: 2472.00

Vollrath's JB3H conveyor sandwich oven has individual top and bottom heat control and adjustable conveyor speed for toasting sandwiches and bread, and melting cheese. This unit is ideal for low-volume sandwich shops and small restaurants. They are not intended to cook raw food or toppings, nor for continuous use. 

Made in the USA for quality and longevity, the JB3H is constructed of stainless and aluminized steel, has a maintenance-free drive system, adjustable product opening, forced convection, and ventless operation. It has been UL tested and verified, and has NSF certification.

      • Made in the USA
      • Stainless and aluminized steel
      • 14.5" wide belt
      • 40" conveyor
      • Variable speed control
      • Variable top and bottom heat control
      • Ventless operation
      • Forced convention
      • Stackable
      • Adjustable product opening
      • Includes uploading tray

SPECS

Model SO2-20814.5 SO2-24014.5
Dimensions (WDH) 20" x 41" x 12.5" 20" x 41" x 12.5"
Conveyor Width 14.5" 14.5"
Product Opening 1.5"-3" adjustable 1.5"-3" adjustable
Phase 1 1
Voltage 208v 240v
Watts 3600w 3600w
Amps 17.3 15
Hz 60 60
Plug NEMA 6-30P NEMA 6-30P

entry.title: Vollrath JPO18 - Ventless Electric Countertop Conveyor Oven - 18" Wide Belt, 26" Chamber
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Countertop Conveyor Oven
Price: 5193.00

Vollrath's JPO18 is a series of electric conveyor ovens with 18" wide belts and 26" long cooking chambers. They bake fresh dough and par-baked pizza, flat breads, and garlic or cheese bread, and offer flexibility and convenience for operations that offer pizza in addition to other menu items. Top and bottom heat control and adjustable conveyor speed allow operators to dial in ideal settings for different types of crust and toppings. 

Made in the USA for performance and durability, these units are constructed of stainless steel and aluminized steel, are UL tested and verified for ventless operation. They sit on adjustable legs and have a 6ft cord with plug.

These ovens are intended to bake one pizza at a time. They are not suited for pizzerias that require continuous-use, high-capacity baking. They are not intended to cook raw food or toppings, frozen or deep dish pizza. 

      • Made in the USA
      • Stainless and aluminized steel construction
      • UL and NDF certified
      • Voltage options
      • Conveyor direction options
      • Ventless operation
      • Variable speed control
      • Thermostatic independent top and bottom heat controls
      • Forced convection
      • Stackable
      • Includes loading and receiving trays
      • Adjustable product opening
      • Adjustable legs
      • 6ft cord with plug

SPECS

Model PO4-20818 PO4-24018
Dimensions (WDH) 68" x 22.87" x 21"
 68" x 22.87" x 21"
Conveyor Width 18" 18"
Product Opening 1.5"-4" adjustable 1.5"-4" adjustable
Voltage 208v 240v
Watts 6200
 6200
Amps 29.8 26
Hz 60 60
Plug NEMA 6-50P NEMA 6-50P
Weight 185 lb 185 lb


WARRANTY

Two year parts and one year labour warranty. Heater tubes have a one year parts and labour warranty (heater tube glass damage is not covered).

FREE-SHIPPING

This item has free shipping in Canada! However, special conditions may apply. Please see our shipping policies or contact us for more information

For instance, even though an item has free shipping, if it weighs over 75 pounds, you may be charged a tailgate fee (unless you have a forklift or a loading dock). Or if you live in a rural or island location, there may be some charges. Otherwise, this item ships free all across Canada!

entry.title: Middleby Marshall PS638E-V - Ventless Fast Bake Electric Conveyor Oven - 26" Wide Belt, 38" Cooking Chamber
entry.summary:
Vendor: Middleby Marshall
Type: Conveyor Oven
Price: 23200.00

The Middleby Marshall ventless oven is very similar to the PS638E, except with the added feature of being ventless. This means that it has internal systems for destroying grease laden vapor prior to the grease escaping the oven, so it is certified as a non-grease emitting appliance. This way, it can be installed without the aid of a Type I or Type II hood. This can save an incredible amount of money and hassle. 

The Middleby Marshall WOW! conveyor series oven utilizes technology that allows the user full control of the air flow in the baking chamber, resulting in optimal results in cooking product. Air flow is modified through the main control, allowing instant results and full control of air movement, time, and temperature settings. This unique technology makes this a "fast bake" convection oven that can greatly increase your production.

      • Impingement PLUS! low oven profile and dual air return
      • Patented EMS Energy Management System
      • 38” long cooking chamber
      • 26" x 65.25" conveyor belt
      • 4" exit tray

SPECS

Model PS638E-V
Dimensions (WDH) 65.25" x 46.25" x 42"
Ship Weight 2,460 lb

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Doyon RPO3 - Electric Countertop Convection Pizza Oven - 3 Tiers, One Chamber
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Countertop Pizza Oven
Price: 10864.00 - 12212.00 (2 variants)

The Doyon RPO3 countertop pizza oven can bake up to 3 pizzas at a time, and with its rotating, perforated nickel decks, plus its Jet Air convection system with a reversing fan -- you'll be able to cook your products very very fast. The capacity can fit three, half-size sheet pans or three, 18" pizzas.

This oven can cook pizzas, wings, and more. It's perfect for the chef who needs to cook a little of everything in a small space. 

      • Rotating high-speed convection pizza oven
      • Countertop model
      • Stainless steel inside and outside
      • Rotating perforated nickel-plated decks
      • Fits three, half-size sheet pans or three, 18" pizzas
      • Digital controls
      • Dropdown door with one handle on each side
      • Full view glass door
      • Easily removable decks for cleaning

VIDEO

entry.title: Celcook Copa Express - High Speed Oven with Convection, Impingement, Microwave & Radiant - 7" x 13" x 11" Cavity (HWD)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Celcook
Type: High Speed Oven
Price: 10514.00

The Celcook by Pratica "Copa Express" (model CPCOPA530) has been engineered to cook fresh, chilled, or frozen food, resulting in delicious flavours and perfect browning and cripsing. It has convection heating, impinged air, microwave cooking, and infrared radiant -- enabling you to make a variety of foods up to 10 times faster than traditional processes.

The major benefit of this model is its compact size and large capacity. This is the most compact speed oven with the largest capacity on the market. This is the only high speed oven in its category that will accept GN's 1/2 size hotel pans (12.75" x 10.3"). It also comes with a large, easy-to-use touch screen controls.

Celcook has expertly designed this machine from years of experience in high-speed combination ovens, giving this machine a high-quality design with all the features you'd expect, but at a fraction of the cost of other name-brands. If you want to compare the features of all of Celcook's high speed ovens, check out their brochure.

      • Up to 1024 recipes, with 8 steps each, divided by 16 groups
      • USB port to upload/download recipes
      • Easy to clean
      • Adjustable temperature from 86° to 530° Fahreneit
      • User friendly Interface
      • Cool to the touch exterior
      • Independently controlled of air speed, microwave and infrared
      • Constructed from AISI430 (exterior) and AISI304 (interior)
      • Stainless Steel
      • Ventless system with easy removable catalytic filter
      • Allows the use of metal pans
      • Manual mode for on-the-fly cooking

VIDEO

INCLUDED ACCESSORIES

      • Paddle
      • Baking Stone
      • Teflon Basket
      • Speed Grill
      • USB flash drive

SPECS

Model Copa Express
Item Number CPCOPA530
Ventless Yes
Voltage 208
Phase Single
Hz 60
Power 5.7 kW
Circuit 30 Amps
Consum. 4 kWh
Plug NEMA 6-30

Weight 174 lb
Chamber Dimensions (HWD) 7.25" x 13.25" x 11.25"

Wall Clearances 1" on sides

entry.title: Sierra SRPO-72G-2 - Gas Double Deck Pizza Deck Oven - 72" x 42" x 68" Deck
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sierra
Type: Pizza Deck Oven
Price: 22949.00

The Sierra range SRPO-72G-2 is a full size, double deck oven with dimensions (WDH) of 72" x 42" x 68". The oven chamber has two, 1-1/2" Fibra-ment stones with a 7" deck height, and, independently controlled top heat to damper the oven's temperature for an even cook. The temperature range is 300 - 650 degrees Fahrenheit. Ovens are shipped from the factory ready for natural gas installation, and a liquid propane conversion kit is included with each unit.

This pizza deck oven has a heavy duty construction with a high quality stainless steel top, front, sides, and legs. Additionally, the doors are insulated and spring-loaded. The oven has tubular type burners that are designed with 12" spacing to evenly distribute the heat.

      • Heavy duty stainless steel top, front, sides, and legs
      • Can cook with a deck, pan, or screen
      • Spring-loaded door
      • Modulating thermostat for energy efficiency; low input BTU 
      • Tubular type burners are designed with 12" spacing
      • 1-1/2" refractory type hearth Fibra-ment stones
      • Temperature range: 300 - 650 degrees Fahrenheit
      • Ovens are shipped from the factory ready for natural gas installation; LP conversion kit is included with each unit

SPECS

Model SRPO-72G-2
Dimensions (WDH) 72" x 42" x 68"
﻿Decks ﻿2
Temperature Range 300 - 650 degrees Fahrenheit
BTU 220,000

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty.

﻿DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Cookshack PZ400 - Wood Fired Pizza Oven - 16" x 16" Chamber
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cookshack
Type: Countertop Pizza Oven
Price: 6253.00

The Cookshack PZ400 is a one of a kind oven: it's a pellet-fired, wood-burning pizza oven, which will deliver consistent, delicious, hand-crafted artisan pizza. You'll be able to produce a delicious pizza cooked over real wood flames in just 3 minutes.

It's an extremely easy to operate machine, with no need to turn the pizza or manage the fire. It's also a versatile oven, with a temperature range from 170 to 900 degrees Fahrenheit, so you can cook a whole lot more than just pizza: give authentic flavour to calzones, Stromboli, bread, lasagna, desserts, and more.

One of the biggest benefits of this machine is its size. Unlike other wood fired pizza ovens, this is a compact machine, which doesn't have to be placed outside. It can be installed underneath a standard commercial hood. This is a high-quality wood-fired pizza oven that was made in the USA and will serve you trouble-free for many years to come.

      • Capacity of one large pizza up to 16" in diameter, or two 7.1" pizzas
      • Cooked with wood pellets
      • Single Chamber
      • 170°‐900° Fahrenheit temperature range
      • Comes with 16" x 16" pizza stone, heat deflector, and four 20 lb. bags of pellets
      • Made in America

    SPECS

    Model PZ400
    Dimensions (WHD) 37.5" x 27.75" x 26.25"
    Cooking Area 16" x 16" pizza stone
    Heat Up Time Approximately 1.5 hours to reach 700°F
    Cook Time Approximately 3 minutes for 1 large pizza at 700°F
    Electrical 120v, 5 amps
    Ship Weight 400 lb
    Capacity 1 large pizza up to 16"

    LEAD TIME

    Because this is a non-stocking item, it may require an extended lead time to ship to you. If you need this item by a certain date, please contact us.

    WARRANTY

    Two year limited warranty including 90 days full parts and labour.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Sierra SRPO-24E - Electric Double Deck, Single Chamber Countertop Pizza Oven - 22" x 21" x 3.25" Decks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sierra
Type: Countertop Deck Oven
Price: 1921.00

The Sierra SRPO-24E is a countertop electric pizza oven, that has been designed for pizza, flat breads, and bakery products that can be baked directly on hearth decks, screens, pans, or baking sheets.

This pizza oven has one large chamber with two "Meteorite" hearth decks. The cooking chamber is 22.3" wide, 21" deep, and each deck has a height of 3.25" (the overall chamber height is 9.5").

It has a heavy-duty stainless steel construction, and the "Meteorite" ceramic deck can achieve maximum heat quickly and has a speedy recovery time, giving you uniformity, consistency, and efficiency. The oven is ideal for a wide variety of establishments, as the temperature can be adjusted from 280° to 650° Fahrenheit.

      • Non-ferrous stainless steel construction including front, top, sides and control panel
      • Double wall construction with heavy insulation for efficiency & cooler exterior surfaces
      • Fully insulated with 1.5" thick industrial grade insulation
      • Each oven comes with 2 hearth decks with a 3.25" deck height
      • Cook directly on the deck or with pans or screens.
      • 4" stainless steel adjustable legs included with every unit.
      • Inside oven door and floor coated with porcelain enamel.

entry.title: Celcook Forza Express - High Speed Pizza Oven with Impingement & Radiant - 5" x 15" x 14" Cavity (HWD)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Celcook
Type: High Speed Oven
Price: 7800.00

The Celcook by Pratica "Forza Express" (model CPFE608) is a high speed pizza oven that uses powerful, precisely-controlled impinged air and infrared elements to deliver increased heat transfer rates, resulting in cooking times up to 50% faster than other ovens. This machine was designed to specialize in raw-dough foods, like pizzas, but can also bake almost anything you put in it.

It has an easily removable catalytic converter, which breaks down grease-laden vapours allowing for ventless operation, so you don't need to buy an expensive ventilation system. And it only requires a 3" back clearance and a 0" side clearance. This oven has been designed from years of industry experience, and so has a high-quality design with all the features you'd expect, but at a fraction of the cost of other name-brand ovens.

If you want to compare the features of all of Celcook's high speed ovens, check out their brochure.

      • Up to 80 recipes with 6 steps
      • USB Port to upload and download recipes
      • Easy to clean
      • Cooks up to 50% faster than traditional ovens
      • Adjustable temperature from 86° to 608° Fahrenheit
      • User friendly interface
      • Cool to the touch exterior
      • Certified ventless with easy removable catalytic converter
      • Allows the use of metal pans

VIDEO

COOK TIMES

Fresh Dough Pizza 2 minutes
Toasted Bagel 20 seconds
Jumbo Pretzel 1 minute, 40 seconds
Macaroni & Cheese 3 minutes, 20 seconds
Jalapeno Popper (frozen) 4 minutes, 30 seconds

      • Baking stone
      • Mesh cooking basket
      • USB drive

entry.summary:
Vendor: Celcook
Type: High Speed Oven
Price: 11010.00

The Celcook by Pratica "Rocket Express" (model CPRE530) is a high speed oven that uses a combination of convection heat, high speed impinged air, bottom infrared radiant, and a precision microwave to drastically reduce cook times by up to 80%, all while maintaining the food's texture and flavour, and giving you an incredible diversity of foods that you can cook.

Equipped with a catalytic converter, this oven can be operated without an expensive ventilation system and only requires a 3" clearance on its back. Overall, this oven comes with all the high speed cooking methods you could want, with a high-quality design that comes from years of industry experience, at a fraction of the cost of other name-brand ovens. Like Celcook says, this machine is "faster than a bullet!"

This oven comes with most of the same features as the Celcook Chef Express, but comes with a full colour capacitive touchscreen display with an intuitive, easy-to-use software. If you want to compare the features of all of Celcook's high speed ovens, check out their brochure.

entry.title: Doyon PIZ6 - Electric Three Deck Countertop Convection Pizza Oven - 40" x 23" x 5.5" Decks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Countertop Deck Oven
Price: 16526.00 - 18669.00 (6 variants)

The Doyon PIZ6 is a unique countertop pizza oven. It features three baking chambers than can each accommodate pizzas up to 18", for a total of six 18" pizzas. It has Doyon's exclusive Jet Air convection system with a reversing fan, which will give you quick and even baking. It has a countertop design, but can also be placed on an optional stand.

Or maybe you want to cook something else in the PIZ6. This is a multi-purpose oven that can also cook sandwiches, Italian food, Mexican food, wings, seafood, poultry, pretzels, pastries, Cajun food, deserts and bakery items. This oven is great for space and energy savings. The three perforated nickel plated decks are designed for fast heat accumulation as well as even heat distribution across the decks.

      • Fast pre-heat and baking
      • High production capability with ability to cook both fresh and par-baked dough
      • Exclusive reversing fan system with nickel plated decks
      • Capacity of six 18" pizzas
      • Production per hour: 60--18" pizzas; 180--9" pizzas; 240--6" pizzas

SPECS

Model PIZ6
Dimensions (WDH) 47.6" x 47" x 36.25"
Deck Dimensions (WDH) 40" x 23.5" x 5.5"
Number of Decks 3
Capacity Six 18" pizzas
Power Electric
Interior Lights Yes
Interior Stainless Steel
Exterior Stainless Steel

WARRANTY

Two year parts, one year labour warranty.

entry.title: TurboChef High h 2020 - Ventless Electric Countertop Conveyor Oven - 20" Wide Belt, 20" Chamber
entry.summary:
Vendor: TurboChef
Type: Countertop Conveyor Oven
Price: 18522.00

The TurboChef "High h Conveyor 2020" is a ventless, electric, countertop conveyor oven that can cook 40 - 50% faster than traditional conveyors. Its high-heat transfer-rates allow it to cook up to sixty 12" pizzas in an hour. This output exceeds that of conveyor ovens with a 28" chamber, and this has a compact 20" design.

The cook chamber is 20" x 20", with a height of 1" - 3". The entire belt length is 48.3". It can fit a full-size sheet pan. It has an idle mode for energy conservation. TurboChef has designed the Conveyor 2020 for business and industry applications, convenience stores, casual dining, education, hotels and resorts, military, fast food restaurants, and theaters across Canada.

      • Cooks up to sixty 12" Pizzas per Hour
      • Cooks 40-50% faster than traditional conveyors
      • Throughput exceeding 28" conveyors in a compact 20" design
      • Idle mode for energy conservation
      • Fits a full-size sheet pan
      • Left or right feed conveyor belt direction via software
      • Mono-finger design evenly distributes air at a higher velocity for more uniform baking and increased menu offerings
      • Easy to clean
      • Operates at temperatures up to 600° Fahrenheit (316° Celsius)
      • Bake time range from 30 seconds to 15 minutes
      • Stackable design up to three high (requires stacking kit)
      • Configurable for UL-KNLZ approved operation without a ventilation hood

COOK TIMES

Toasted Italian Sandwich 60 Seconds
Tex-Mex Plate 1 Minute 10 Seconds
Roasted Fish Fillets (fresh) 1 Minute 45 Seconds
16-inch Pizza (fresh dough) 2 Minutes 45 Seconds
Chicken Wings (frozen) 4 Minutes
